text:
Several times I have searched on the net to kill long running http request in Tomcat, but there is no way out there. Sometimes there are http request I can see there in Tomcat Manager, those are Stuck due to Several Problems like infinite loops, Waiting for another Server etc. Tomcat Manager is listing those threads with time they have consume, but there is no way to close that request.

If we can add this functionality in Tomcat Manager, it will help a lot to Managar and will definately improve Tomcat performance.

I know we have to improve a code in such a way that request should not stuck, but what if it happends, we have to restart tomcat compusorily, which is not feasible in criticle applications.
